Reviews.Author: Marie Fortune "jazafionada"
Reviews.Content: Love this little ereader that I bought about a year ago from Amazon. Came with a lovely black case and all the works. I cannot remember what I paid for it but it was a steal and still works beautifully. I can download my books from my local library and browse the internet, listen to music. I just love it
Reviews.Title: My favorite ebook reader

Reviews.Author: A. Bosley
Reviews.Content: This is my second tablet. The first was returned promptly. I purchased this refurbished but it very nice condition. It was approximately $40 and came preloaded with some classic e-books. It also came with a charger, black case, and a stylus.I had a little trouble getting started with it. I particularly disliked the App store that came with the product. After reading some online suggestions, I downloaded the SlideMe market. This helped tremendously and I haven't had any problems getting the apps I want for free.I have no problems connecting to free WiFi hotspots and wireless internet in my home. The size is great and I can easily read and use the internet without issues. Other than a few freeze ups now and then, I haven't had any issues. This was so much better than my last tablet and it was a great value.
Reviews.Title: Love it!
